test_name: OVLO Transient Behavior at Maximum Load
purpose: Verify safe operation and transient behavior when V+ exceeds the overvoltage lockout (OVLO) threshold at maximum load.
scope: Applies to all DUTs with OVLO enabled and rated for maximum load current.
setup: Connect DUT to maximum rated load. Use programmable supply to sweep V+ through OVLO range. Monitor switch node and sensitive component nodes with an oscilloscope.
procedure:
1. Set load to maximum rated current.
2. Starting from nominal V+, ramp V+ upward through the OVLO threshold.
3. Capture switch node and sensitive nodes during OVLO events.
4. Repeat for multiple V+ ramp rates if applicable.
measurement: Measure overshoot/undershoot on switch node and other sensitive nodes. Record any abnormal behavior or fault events.
acceptancecriteria: Voltages must not exceed absolute maximum ratings. No sustained oscillations or unstable behavior.

measurement_settings.other_settings: Ch1 on SW_NODE with high-voltage probe.

acceptance_thresholds.notes: Must be below GaN FET VDS max including ringing.

example_data.description: Representative OVLO transient at max load.
